Fee Schedule

Source: vignettes/fee-schedule.Rmd
fee-schedule.Rmd
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(gt)

Look Up HCPCS Code 

hcpcs_search(
  hcpcs = "39503", 
  state = "GA", 
  locality = "99",
  mac = "10212") |> 
  janitor::remove_empty(which = c("rows", "cols")) |>
  dplyr::rowwise() |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    description_clinician = purrr::map(
      description_clinician, ~paste0("* ", ., collapse = "\n"))) |>
  tidyr::unnest(cols = description_clinician) |>
  dplyr::ungroup() |> 
  northstar:::display_long() |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_markdown() |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Jetbrains Mono")) |>
  tab_options(
    column_labels.hidden = TRUE,
    table.width = pct(75),
    heading.title.font.size = px(20),
    heading.subtitle.font.size = px(14),
    heading.align = "left",
    footnotes.font.size = px(12))

Physician Fee Schedule Amount Calculation


\(RVU_w\) Work Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_w\) Work Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(RVU_p\) Practice Expense Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_p\) Practice Expense Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(RVU_m\) Malpractice Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_m\) Malpractice Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(CF\) Conversion Factor


The Participating amount is calculated as follows:



\[x = [(RVU_w \times GPCI_w) + (RVU_p \times GPCI_p) + (RVU_m \times GPCI_m)] \times CF\]


The Non-participating amount is calculated as follows:


\[ y = 0.95x\]


The Limiting charge is calculated as follows:


\[ z = 0.95(1.15x)\]


calculate_amounts(
  wrvu  = 6.26,
  nprvu = 7.92,
  fprvu = 4.36,
  mrvu  = 0.99,
  cf    = 32.744,
  wgpci = 1,
  pgpci = 0.883,
  mgpci = 1.125
)
#> Facility Amounts:
#> 
#> RVU Total ............ 11.22
#> Participating ........ $367.51
#> Non-Particpating ..... $349.13
#> Limiting Charge ...... $401.50
#> 
#> Non-Facility Amounts:
#> 
#> RVU Total ............ 14.37
#> Participating ........ $470.44
#> Non-Particpating ..... $446.91
#> Limiting Charge ...... $513.95
